title: Hello World
content: keep an independent voice of yourself.

/* 拉大Logo与下方文字距离 */ .header .title .main { margin-bottom: 2px; } /* 背景噪点效果 start */ body::before { content: ""; display: block; width: 100%; height: 100%; position: fixed; z-index: 10; pointer-events: none; touch-action: none; opacity: .037; background: repeating-radial-gradient(#373d43 0 0.0001%, #f5f5f5 0 0.0002%) 50% 0/2500px 2500px, repeating-conic-gradient(#373d43 0 0.0001%, #f5f5f5 0 0.0002%) 60% 60%/2500px 2500px; background-blend-mode: difference; animation: noise .2s infinite alternate; } @keyframes noise { 100% { background-position: 50% 0, 60% 50% } } /* 背景噪点 end */
